ui.description: UI primitives from {{PROJECT_PATHS.ui}} - reusable components, hooks, and utilities

web.description: React 18+ with TypeScript (Phase 3 only, currently CLI-only) web application - pages, app router, web-specific hooks and utilities

api.description: Unified backend API symbols - based on Collection (Personal Library) → Projects (Local .claude/ directories) → Deployment Engine → User/Local Scopes (use apiLayers for targeted access)

shared.description: Shared utilities and types - configure based on your project structure

routers.description: API route handlers - Click (CLI), FastAPI (Phase 3 web interface) routers and HTTP endpoints with request/response handling

services.description: Business logic services - orchestration, validation, and domain operations (based on Collection (Personal Library) → Projects (Local .claude/ directories) → Deployment Engine → User/Local Scopes)

repositories.description: Data access layer - database queries, ORM operations (SQLite (Phase 3 web interface, currently file-based TOML))

schemas.description: Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) - models for API serialization and validation

cores.description: Core utilities and foundations - auth, observability, middleware, error handling

metadata.author: SkillMeat Development Team
metadata.description: Symbol extraction configuration for SkillMeat project. Supports domain-chunked symbols and layer-based API access for token-efficient codebase analysis. Architecture: Collection (Personal Library) → Projects (Local .claude/ directories) → Deployment Engine → User/Local Scopes

_template_notes.description: This is a templatized configuration file. Replace {{VARIABLES}} with your project-specific values.
required_variables: DATABASE - Database and ORM (e.g., 'PostgreSQL with SQLAlchemy')
customization_steps: 1. Replace all {{VARIABLE}} placeholders with your project values
2. Update domains section to match your project structure
3. Configure apiLayers to match your backend architecture
4. Update extraction.python.directories with your backend paths
5. Update extraction.typescript.directories with your frontend paths
6. Adjust excludes patterns for your build/dependency directories
